language.name: en_CA
language.description: ScanCore scan agent that monitors hardware, like RAM modules, CSS LED status, CPU information, etc.
language.key: This host is a: [#!variable!host_type!#], this agent is only useful on nodes and DR hosts. Exiting.
We're node 2, and node 1 is running as well. Exiting as only one node needs to run this agent.
